name: Cool Minecraft (Guns, Exploding Mobs, and More!)
name_original: Cool Minecraft (Guns, Exploding Mobs, and More!)
description:
I made Minecraft  using Unity 3D but spiced it up with exploding body parts, guns, a custom mob, and freezing time. There's also mining/crafting and a day/night cycle. The controls are in the zip files.

If you like this game, make sure to see how it was made:

Also feel free to check out my YouTube channel for more videos and games:

https://www.youtube.com/TylerGreen
